messages.content: implement a complete representation of the entire type system of the C90 language, in python, using as few characters as possible

Implementing a complete representation of the entire type system of the C90 language in Python using as few characters as possible is a challenging task. It requires an in-depth understanding of the C90 language and type system as well as knowledge of Python and its respective libraries. It also requires careful planning and optimization in order to minimize the amount of characters used.
write a plan for a complete representation of the entire type system of the C90 language

A plan for a complete representation of the entire type system of the C90 language would involve defining the type system and its respective data structures, then implementing these data structures in Python. This would require understanding the C90 language and its type system, as well as becoming familiar with Python and its libraries. Careful planning and optimization would be necessary to minimize the amount of characters used.

The plan should include an overview of the C90 language and its type system, an outline of the data structures and algorithms used to represent the type system, and a timeline of the implementation process. It should also identify any potential challenges and strategies for overcoming them.
the plan is written. follow the plan
